description:
This module will provide students a practical approach in appraising the process, steps and rigor in academic writing; grant writing and writing for publications. It will enable students to draft funding proposals for their graduate
studies, and draft manuscripts for publications. The topics include principles of academic writing, common problems in academic writing, and good style in academic writing.
title: Grant Writing and Writing for Publications
department: Alice Lee Center for Nursing Studies
faculty: Yong Loo Lin Sch of Medicine
